title: Boeing Commercial Airplanes Chief Leaving Amid 737 MAX Crisis
text:
Boeing Co. launched sweeping management changes on Tuesday, replacing the head of its jetliner business as it struggles to shore up eroding confidence among customers, investors and lawmakers in the aerospace giant’s ability to recover from the crisis surrounding its 737 MAX aircraft.

The removal of Kevin McAllister is the first high-level departure from Boeing since the second crash of a MAX in March triggered a global grounding of its best-selling jet and billions of dollars in losses at the nation’s largest exporter.

...
description: Kevin McAllister is leaving Boeing as head of the commercial airplanes unit, the highest-profile departure from the company as a result of the crisis surrounding its 737 MAX airliner.
